customer_addr:

New Holland, PA 17557

citations.narrative:
A current record of guinea pigs was not available during this inspection. A total of 468 adult guinea pigs, weanlings, and
newborns were counted at time of this inspection. The last recording of any guinea pigs was for some weanling guinea
pigs the early part of August 2024. Failure to maintain these records makes it difficult to assess the health of the caviary
by identifying animal losses by decrease number of guinea pigs born or raised. The licensee must maintain records
containing the required information for animals which disclose the number of guinea pigs held, owned, acquired or
disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by September 30, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
A current record of guinea pigs was not available during this inspection. A total of 468 adult guinea pigs, weanlings, and 
newborns were counted at time of this inspection. The last recording of any guinea pigs was for some weanling guinea 
pigs the early part of August 2024. Failure to maintain these records makes it difficult to assess the health of the caviary 
by identifying animal losses by decrease number of guinea pigs born or raised. The licensee must maintain records 
containing the required information for animals which disclose the number of guinea pigs held, owned, acquired or 
disposed of including births and deaths. Correct by September 30, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
